para.text: A holder of property presumed abandoned and subject to the custody of the Administrator shall report in a record to the Administrator concerning the property. The Administrator may not require a holder to file a paper report.
A holder may contract with a third party to make the report required under subsection (a) of this section.
Whether or not a holder contracts with a third party under subsection (b) of this section, the holder is responsible:
For the complete, accurate, and timely reporting of property presumed abandoned to the Administrator; and
For paying or delivering to the Administrator property described in the report.
